page.title: 09MODEL RAILWAY SUTTON C'FIELD
page.content: { Don Jones,}life-long Suttonian,is a {railway enthusiast.}He has watched the rebuilding of Birmingham's New Street Station,whilst simultaneously reproducing it in his own back garden. A twenty by forty foot wooden shed contains an entirely accurate 1:30 {scale model}of the sub-terranean station and its associated shopping centre.Don has used the architect's original plans. Each building is painstakingly re-created out of plastic and takes {hundreds of hours}to construct. The New Street model has occupied Don's leisure time for twenty four years.The{suburban garden}now contains one{kilometre}of track. Every year Don raises money for {charity}and delights the public at an Open Day,when privileged visitors can even control the model trains.
